description:
Bu uygulama sayesinde Ankara, Turkiye cevresinde bulunan nobetci eczanelerin detayli listesine ve haritadaki konumlarina ulasmak mumkundur. 

Konum verileri otomatik olarak cekilmektedir, dolayisiyla eczaneye gitmeden once telefonla aramaniz yarariniza olur. Konumunuzu paylasmaniz durumunda kus ucusu uzakligi baz alinarak eczanelere olan uzakliginiz listelenir. 

--- 

Aim of this app is to locate and list detailed information about certain pharmacies that are 24 hours open in the given day in the location of Ankara, Turkey . 

Location information is dynamically taken from maps, therefore please call the pharmacy that you will visit in case of wrong information. If you share your current location application will sort the distance of pharmacies to your position.
